results.title: Black ash
results.brief_description: An account of a typical ‘lazy day’ by the river in Warburton which suddenly turns nasty when Bonnie and her friends realise the gravity of the fire. She recounts her anxiety and wanting to leave Warburton and her frustration at her family’s indecisions. She is stuck in Lysterfield after they evacuate with 17 people.
results.description: An account of a typical ‘lazy day’ by the river in Warburton which suddenly turns nasty when Bonnie and her friends realise the gravity of the fire. She recounts her anxiety and wanting to leave Warburton and her frustration at her family’s indecisions. She is stuck in Lysterfield after they evacuate with 17 people.
description_for_label: An account of a typical ‘lazy day’ by the river in Warburton which suddenly turns nasty when Bonnie and her friends realise the gravity of the fire. She recounts her anxiety and wanting to leave Warburton and her frustration at her family’s indecisions. She is stuck in Lysterfield after they evacuate with 17 people.

results.title: [Untitled]
results.creator_credit: Bo Barney, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Bo Barney suffered a difficult and traumatic childhood where violence was a daily event, and education almost non-existent. This story of how Bo turned his life around through determination and persistence is truly inspirational.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Bo Barney, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.description: Bo Barney suffered a difficult and traumatic childhood where violence was a daily event, and education almost non-existent. This story of how Bo turned his life around through determination and persistence is truly inspirational.

results.title: Strong and Proud
results.creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling and Darren Atkinson
results.brief_description: Darren grew up on Cummeragunja Mission and in this digital story he talks about his grandfather’s life, the Koori community and the handing down of Indigenous traditions and culture from one generation to the next.
results.description: Darren grew up on Cummeragunja Mission and in this digital story he talks about his grandfather’s life, the Koori community and the handing down of Indigenous traditions and culture from one generation to the next.
description_for_label: Darren grew up on Cummeragunja Mission and in this digital story he talks about his grandfather’s life, the Koori community and the handing down of Indigenous traditions and culture from one generation to the next.

results.brief_description:
Mick Booth was brought up in Kent Street, Fitzroy - an inner suburb of Melbourne. This is his story of childhood memories, family and growing up in Fitzroy.
In English language with English subtitles.

results.title: Leaving My Country
results.creator_credit: Grant Hood, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: An argument with his uncle one night would turn out to be a life-changing experience for Grant Hood, a proud Kurnai Gunai man. Grant mentions the importance of his meeting with Kutcha Edwards when he first arrives in Melbourne. A photo of a very young Kutcha is also shown.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Grant Hood, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.description: An argument with his uncle one night would turn out to be a life-changing experience for Grant Hood, a proud Kurnai Gunai man. Grant mentions the importance of his meeting with Kutcha Edwards when he first arrives in Melbourne. A photo of a very young Kutcha is also shown.
